description: Grafana pendant for Node-Level Performance Data KSC graphs

targets.expression: (( CpuRawUser + CpuRawNice + CpuRawSystem )   / ( CpuRawUser + CpuRawNice  + CpuRawSystem + CpuRawIdle ) * 100.0)
targets.label: CPU

panels.description: The number of 'ticks' (typically 1/100s)  spent processing code.
panels.title: CPU Usage

title: OpenNMS Linux Node-level Performance Data
